sqlMap.update: update tbl_user set username = #username#, password = #password#, org_unit_id = #organization.id#, person_id = #person.id#, last_changed = now() where user_id = #id# and last_changed = #lastChanged#;
sqlMap.delete: delete from tbl_user where user_id = #id# and last_changed = #lastChanged#
